VFEC.Senators.RepublicDef.label: republic
VFEC.Senators.RepublicDef.letterText: After gaining the support of all 3 parts of the republic, it has now united under your rule. You have now become Emperor.

VFEC.RoadBuildingDef.label: Build Path
VFEC.RoadBuildingDef.description: Orders pawns in the caravan to clear foliage to make a simple clear path.

VFEC.RoadBuildingDef.label: Build Dirt road
VFEC.RoadBuildingDef.description: Orders pawns in the caravan to clear foliage and tamp dirt to make a somewhat easily traversed dirt road.

VFEC.RoadBuildingDef.label: Build Stone road
VFEC.RoadBuildingDef.description: Orders pawns in the caravan to clear foliage, then cut and place blocks to make an easily traversable stone road.
